Class HibernateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.gson.HibernateHelper

  • @Configurable
class HibernateHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Workaround to avoid pulling in more dependencies to core-processor.jar.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
